content.detailedDescription: Was taking my daughter home ,elizabeth pa, roughly 2pm. we noticed a rainbow that appeared to touch the ground right in the valley about a hundred yards from the road. i suggested to my daughter (she was nine then) that if we ran down through the field , we might be surrounded by colors , and maybe even find a pot of gold. well the grass was way to tall and wet , so i suggested we just take a picture instead. i grabbed my disposable camera, and since i couldnt fit the whole rainbow in one shot , i took the right half first, and trying very hard to line it up right , i panned left and as i did i saw something in the sky come into view through the lens. i didnt want to lose my lineup , so i snapped the picture, then pulled the camera away and saw a dark object hovering. i turned to tell my daughter to look , and when i turned back it was gone, but she did see it to , cuz when i turned to her she was already looking at it strangely. she asked what it was , and after a moments thought, i figured it best to reply "probably just a hawk, or somethin." it was not a hawk. i am an avid bird watcher, and ive never seen a hawk just dissapear....Got the pics developed , and here ya go. hawk ?
content.summary: Was taking photo of rainbow , saw something enter frame , snapped pic.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine and i were at ft lauderdale beach, looking out onto the ocean and around 210 pm noticed two metallic orbs about 25 miles off shore, 1/2 to 1 inch above the horizon.  there were no boats around them. no apparent tethers. no contrails, smoke, etc, things associated with propulsion aircraft.

the object to the south hovered in the same spot. around 225 pm, the object, went down directly into the atlantic.  the object to the north continued to hover until 3 pm, when we left the beach.

i have seen a similar sighting, in a different part of the world, where the object went down directly into the water.
content.summary: Ufo sightings off coast of broward county

content.detailedDescription:
I sleep in my attic bedroom under a skylight sometimes.. i awoke on
nov 8 at about 6:40 am i saw a bright morning 'star' that should not have been there and i could just discern a disk to it so i grabbed the binoculars (i keep binoculars and camera on attic bed stand) and saw i could see an odd object. this was not a planet nor a star.. unless planets look like glowing blobs..With arms.. and a dark windscreen on one side..

at first i though morning planet.. 

i then grabbed the camera and running on manual focus, because of the glass of the skylight, focused the camera (fuji finepix) on the object, and took many images... at 10x optical zoom..  of the 9 images, three were shake-free... so i copied the images from two of the shake free images onto one image.. and cropped it so it wouldn't be a huge file. there was one object, the upper and lower one in the image are from other frames..

re feelings etc, it was very pretty, and a exquisite bluish tint to the color.

it did not appear to move at all, i lined up by eye with a leaf edge on the skylight and watched for some time and could note no motion at all. and i was able to see it until after the sun had risen about 45 minutes later and then i lost it  in the rapidly brightening sky. there were high light clouds, but i couldn't tell you which side of clouds this thing was on, it was at about 11 oclock in elevation from the southwest. it was not there the following morning, nor today.
content.summary: Saw a bright morning 'star' that should not have been there and i could just discern a disk to it so i took a view pictures

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting by the river at my home, with 3 visitors, i ventured to look up and around for a peek at the stars which were fairly bright.(hoping to see satellites fly over.)
i noticed a flash of light seemingly coming from an aircraft coming north, afterward realizing that this kind of flash was unreasonably bright and large for an ordinary aircraft.(nighttime photography? not likely!)
it was also to far east of the flight path (victor37) that is used for north-south service by regional jets.)
i looked for a few more seconds and turned away to fit back in with the visitors.
then i caught a second flash from the corner of my eye and looked up again but could not focus in time, i kept looking and then the third flash caught my eye dead on. at this point i sensed it to be more like a round ball due to the size of it and the height i estimated it to be traveling at.(i would guess maybe between 30 to 60 feet in diameter.)
the trajectory or flight path(estimated from three flashes.) was from the southern skyline(barely visible.)directly toward us at an assumed height of approximately 5000 to 20000 feet.(i have some experience with flying small aircraft but this should be construed as an educated guess.)the path north was concluded with a total of 3 flashes, after which i couldn't see anymore flashes.
the next moment, maybe 1/2 minute after the first sighting, i was searching the sky for satellites with the naked eye, to show them to my visitors, when i noticed another flash, this time in a due east direction (which is behind me, while the first three flashes were to my left,facing to the south.)at this time i had mentioned the first few flashes to my visitors of whom only one saw the last one coming north.
i exclaimed "there it goes again!" and pointed at the direction eastward where it just flashed, when it flashed once more in the east.
i continued to expect another flash and just as i had the impulse to turn my head back, ready to give up, there was another flash! but way down toward the east this time, (i estimated about at least 100 miles away.)
then maybe a 1/2 minute later as i was looking in the western sky, i caught yet another flash directly opposite in direction of the two easterly ones, and right over the hill which i faced, to the west of my property, which is close by and high, my viewing angle about 40 degrees up,(distance between the eastern and western flashes had to be at least 100 or more miles.)

that concluded the sighting of the flashes, and a short conversation ensued about possible aliens.

i cannot reasonably deny the exsistence of aliens, nor do i want to, as we ourselves could very well be aliens to another species of life out there and i like to keep an open mind.(i am however quite interested in the subject and look up the sites for new information from time to time.)

the afterthoughts!

i concluded quickly that the path from above the physically visible skyline to the south, to a point above me, where "it" seemed to have turned east, to the last flash in the eastern direction, to the last flash visible to me in the west, was too long for any aircraft (even a fighter at mach 1.)to have covered in the space of two to three minutes.(i figure about 200-250 miles total.)

furthermore; the speed at which the flashes traversed the path i described, seemed a little fast for normal travel, and besides that, there was no noise at all. 
the directional change was at a perfect 90 degree angle from s-n to w-e, and one at 180 degrees from e to w to end up flashing one last time in the west.
it also seemed to occur in my mind that somehow the directional change from nothbound to eastbound seemed quite quick, as the next flash i discovered was well on the way east, while i had just viewed the last flash coming north seemingly a split second ago (i had said 1/2 minute.)

the time between the last flash in the east and the flash in the west, was at an unreasonable distance apart for the speed that even fast military aircraft would fly, in my opinion.
also to fly at a speed which would break the sound barrier, a noise of some kind would have to be heard if the object was indeed a man made craft or of a solid nature, and in this case (i live in a very quiet secluded area which is always very peaceful.)there was no noises at all, including when "it" had to have flown over and made the 90 degree turn to head east, whereas normal flights are mostly always heard as they pass even further to the west.(in my area the usual "overflights" are mostly from s to n(10 miles to the west,) or from se to nw.(passing about 3 miles north east of my location.

the only military flight path which is used here is a path which comes from the se, on a radial of about 310 degrees or nw, from the direction of the trenton airbase in ontario, to north bay, and from there goes west or straight east. there is no experimental activity here at all, unless it is unpublished, which i doubt because of the aproaches to the north bay airport, and my property being just se outside the control zone for aproach.
the practice area for student flying is within our space above the house, but no after dark  flying occurs as we do not have ifr training here in this part of the zone, and the flashes were above the practice zone and outside that particular area in any case. (above 5000'agl.)

i have often wondered about this situation and finally decided to write it out and send it.

 i would not push the point of having seen an "alien" craft as i simply did not see "any" craft at all, just the unseemingly bright(very white, like a very strong auto headlight.) and round like a transparent ball lit up from the inside.
the flashes were very quick on and off, but longer than a flash of a camera. if i had to guess at how long, i would say from .25 to .5 of a second duration.
i also thought the flashshes to the east (or the west.) would not have shown if it was a landing light mounted on a wing and facing forward away from me. each flash still gave the impression of being totally round.
i have not discussed this any further with anyone including the visitors of which one admitted to have seen it, but was not receptive to the idea of having seen something other than human originated light.(i understood the reason for this was a spiritual one.)

i conclude with stating that i am well educated, and have reasonable enough education in aircraft systems and avionics to have graduated at 93% with honours (a&p mechanic.), and that i have an excellent aptitude for technology and science among more certificates and diplomas in the mechanical and engineering fields.

personally, i like the thought of maybe having seen something which could possibly be of an extra terrestrial nature, as i am expectant to find that such ocurrences are due and forthcoming in our own quest for knowledge of the universes.

thank you.
john smit.
content.summary: 7 unrealisticly bright flashes,path south  north 3, then west east 3, then east west 1

content.detailedDescription: These are more web cam pics from the post below taken from a web cam at this web cam site http://www.Phoenixvis.Net/esmo1/index.Html. the 4pm large you can see the object at the right of the tree.On the 5pm large pic i think the object is the greenish glow on the mountian.
content.summary: Phoenix az web cam pictures

content.detailedDescription: I saw this ufo on this phoenix web site http://www.Phoenixvis.Net/esmo1/index.Html it lasted from 3:00pm-4:00pm the web cam is supost to update every 15 minutes but has not been  accurate scince the ufo was in its site.More pictures are avaiable in between these times but i am olny alowed to post 3.                     ufo or not you decide.
content.summary: Ufo seen on arizona webcam

content.detailedDescription:
"full description & details
it was a summer night, maybe about 10pm or so. i was driving south on the bronx river parkway, going south, just opposite the mt. vernon (metro-north) train station. i was driving my 1979 buick regal (with t-tops off) when i saw a boomerang shaped object going south (parallel to the parkway) over my head. i was going about 60 mph as the object passed overhead. when i got a good focus on this object i slowed down and pulled into the right hand lane, my speed was now about 5 or 10 mph as was the speed of the other cars who also saw this object. we all just crept along looking up at this object. it made no sound at all and also slowed down to match our speed. it was about as high as a 20 or 30 story building (judging by the height of the apartment buildings just to the west of the parkway which vary from 5 to 12 (aprox) stories. when it got just past the train station it stopped, as did all of the cars going south on the parkway. it paused for a few seconds and then pivoted/turned to the east and started to move again but now was going east and picked up speed to about 50 or 60 mph. as i was looking at it along with the other cars on the parkway it was clear as could be in the shape of a boomerang but huge.... similar to a very large jet airliner but no body just the wings and much larger...Maybe 3 or 4 times larger than a 747. i saw no colors, only luminous panels covering the entire bottom of the object. these panels were rectangles and some of them were emitting bright light and some were barley putting out any light at all. it continued to the east for maybe 20 seconds to the top of my view east and was above some houses and trees when it made another pivot/turn to the south this time. it started to move south for 2 or 3 seconds when it accelerated so fast that it looked like a solid white line pointing south, the object "stretched" to the south and then the back or the line "caught up " with the front of the line and it was gone. people looking at it from the parkway, all of whom had come to just about a full stop, kind of looked at each other and then resumed thier driving. nobody said a word about what had just happened, they just went about their business....This was very weird . i had a friend in the car with me but i really don't remember saying anything to him while this was happening. when the object was gone we did talk about it but , looking back now, neither of us was scared or panicked. we both told other friends about this object and even drew sketches of it...Nobody believed us! and i never read or heard about anyone else seeing this object. to this day it is as clear in my mind as the night it happened.."
this statement was copied from "http://www.Ufoevidence.Org/sightings/report.Asp?Id=973" where i posted it on 1/16/2004 8:57:53 am. i have also fixed some of my spelling mistakes in this posting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: In the shape of a boomerang.... similar in size to a very large jet airliner but no body just the wings and much larger...Maybe 3 or 4 times larger than a 747. i saw no colors, only luminus panels covering the entire bottom of the object.

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking up the rear entry staircase to my house, i saw something out of the  corner of my eye.  i looked down quickly to assure my footing, and then looked up.  i saw what appeared to be a very large object, defined in shape only by the dim orange marker lights at each corner.  i was struck by an intense sense of curiosity about this.  the object was moving at a steady rate, and blocked out starlight as it passed overhead.  there was no sound associated with the object.  the location of this siting is very close to the takeoff and landing flight pattern for anchorage international airport, but there were no other aircraft in the area at that moment.  i closed my eyes for a split second and watched again.  the object continued on its path, and i lost it as it moved beyond my line of site.  the whole episode lasted approximately 4-5 seconds.  i have not doubted that others have witnessed similar things, but now know first hand what such an experience is like.  quite indescribable, yet very real.
content.summary: Triangular shaped ufo blocks starlight in anchorage

content.detailedDescription: In 1967 i was 19 years old and i along with several other young men had met a man who called himself gary and we lived at the ymca kansas city kansas that at that time rented rooms. gary said he had walked across the desert from california and was guided to kansas city kansas by a mother ship and every night gary would go to the roof and attempt to show us ufo's and gary was always dressed in a flak jacketand a crew cut that looked like he came out of world war ii. one night me and three of my friends along with gary went in my car to see if we could spot a ufo and gary kept pointing to the sky and said there is the mother ship. somehow i managed to be in the country either in western wyandotte county ks or eastern leavenworth county ks and somehow we ended up in a desolate location. i remember looking and next to my car to the left in the air was an airplane as i would describe as out of world war ii suspended in the air all lights off and the next thing i remember is that the plane(object) was to the right of my car looking directly at us in the air and then was above the car for how long i don't know as i must have lost tract of time and finally was facing us over a tree looking directly at the car and then finally was back in the same position to the left. the plane then ejected a gold/yellow ball of light from the rear of the plane and i drove off. i never had a memory of the plane going from one place to the next and somehow i must have lost time. i along with gary and three of my friends drove to the turner district in wyandotte county to the inland cold storge area(caves) next to the kansas(kaw)river. as i was driving and this had to be around 3am i looked over and saw a green paneled van and the driver was parked on the road looking toward my car as he was on side dirt or gravel road that was next to the river.I remember telling everyone in the car look at that nut as this man had on dark(black) glasses and had on black cap. as we drove past him a siren came in behind me and i stopped as it was the wyandotte county sherrif's department and they wanted to know why we were out there so late and i told one of the deputies as they checked our id that we were looking for ufo's and they told us to go home as neither deputy laughed at us or doubted our word. the next day i along with one of my friends went to gary's room and he never answered and we checked at the front desk and the clerk said he had not seen gary but would check his room as when he did gary was not in his room and whatever belongings he had were gone as we never seen gary again. a week later on saturday afternoon i was on the third floor ymca shower getting ready for my date and i remember like it happened today the outer door to the restroom opened and a young man in his teens or twenties at least six feet tall with flowing blond hair and wearing dark black glasses and some type of white clothes walked directly to the shower as by this time i went to the shower door as it had a small window as to look out and opened the door and this young man grabed my groin and yanked my penis and then turned around and left as i was stunned and shocked. i dried off and got dressed and went to the desk and ask the man at the desk if he saw anyone leave and he said no by then another man came down and said he had been taking a shower on the second floor shower and the same young man walked to the shower door opened it looked at him and left without touching him. i was dating ny future wife at the time and told her and her parents as we sort of brushed this off at the time as i never contacted the police as i was not hurt but only reported this as i said to the man at the desk who wrote an incident report.In 1968 i entered the united states army at fort leonard wood mo and during basic training i hurt my leg and went to the base hospital,and was exaimed as i hurt my femur bone during training and my leg was exrayed and on the exray it clearly showed a large object lodged on my femur bone as the doctors were not sure if it was a tumor or not and said they may need to operate as it was an unusual object.I was never operated on but have had exray's taken at different times over the years and most recent again at the va the last year as i seen that this object is still on the femur bone. i am now 61 and remember this like it was yesterday and off and on have attempted to contact mufon in kc and california and just recently in new york as i have made contact recently but have never told my story yet and i'm waiting to hear back as i need to know what happened that week and if i have an implant on my femur bone and and i along with gary and my friends taken aboard this ship and also if the young man who touched me was an alien and implanted me. i have tried piecing the puzzle together about this incident that occurred in 1967that was 40 years ago as i am now 61 but i remember this like it happened today every detail.I have more to add  but will do so soon.
content.summary: I encountered an airplane that had all lights out.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my car on the garden state parkway at night.  i looked out my window and saw a saturn shaped object in the sky.   the ball in the middle was glowing yellow and there was a red ring going around it.  i knew they were attached, because they were moving together.  the object was slowly hovering forward.   i did not see any aliens.   it went behind a tree and then it disappeared.
content.summary: Saturn looking object

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were travelling along ascot way when, at the traffic light (which has since been replaced) we noticed a huge cirindrical disk hovering about 100 metres above old miltonians sports club. the 'disk' had rotating multicoloured lights at it's base, was approximately 400m in diameter and made no sound. i stopped the car and got out to have a closer look. 

the craft hovering silently, began to move slowly in a northerly direction. i then got back into the car and proceeded to follow it. within 3 seconds the craft sped away at lightening speed, no sound, nothing.

the incident lasted 3 minutes in total, no one appeared to be in the area. we know it was a ufo, and wish to this day we has a camera to show everyone. it would be great to hear from anyone else in the area who can corroborate our sighting!
content.summary: Ufo over bulawayo (om's club)

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on the george washington memorial parkway about 10:14 pm on november 8, 2007.  i was returning home after my coast guard auxiliary meeting that night.  i happened to look to my left and saw a  streak of green light in the direction of the nearby potomac river, seeminlgy over it.  if i did just not happen to look that way, i would not have seen it.  there was no sound.  it resembled the bright green light seen in fireworks.  it gave me the impression of a large firework traveling horizontally.  there are a lot of trees in that area, and it was difficult to see whether the object's track continued and that my view of it was just obscured, or whether it was just a brief glimpse, almost as if the phenomenon appeared and then disappeared, as in going in and out of dimensions or 'planes.'  there might have been a leading edge of plasma ball at the southward end, but it all happened so fast that i cannot be sure.  i have that impression in memory.  i remember feeling good about the sighting; having a feeling of elation at the time.  the light streak was bright and beautiful, and i like fireworks.  however, i was also struck that this just did not seem normal--a firework-like phenomenon traveling horizontally.  this occurred in the flyway (landing and takeoff path) of washington reagan national airport, and i had the thought that what i saw could have been a military flare of the type that i believe many nations use to dispense from aircraft as decoys to spoof anti-aircraft missiles.  after i saw the phenomenon and lost track of if, i was hoping that i would get a chance to see it again in the sky, but could not.  i was also wondering if other people in cars or observing from a stationary point on the ground had seen anything.  i felt frustrated at being around other drivers but having no way to just stop them and say, did you see what i saw?  i was wondering if the phenomenon would become stationary and then people would stop and get out of their cars to watch it, but that did not happen.  i do not know what i saw that night, but it seemed to be more of a plasma or streak of light than an object.  i would say it resembled a large, green flare, traveling horizontally.  i looked around as i got off the parkway and onto 395 south, but saw nothing more.
content.summary: Saw bright green streak of light over potomac river heading south

content.detailedDescription: Ufo hovering over a house, about 10 feet over the house.Yellow lights on bottom of craft and no sound coming from craft
content.summary: 50 feet, classic shape, yellow lights on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
Please see attached diagram.
at approximately 9 p.M. on march night, i was at work. i was outdoors when i noticed what i thought was an approaching jetliner coming in from the east and preparing for a landing at either the san jose or san francisco airport. 

i typically watched that flight corridor whenever i was outdoors. i am constantly looking at the sky (i am an amateur astronomer.

the single object i saw that night was stationary when i first noticed it. i did not see any other lights that are normally seen as aircraft approach at night.

i watched it hover for roughly 90 seconds, then it started to travel forward and to a lower altitude (about 2 seconds elapse time), at which point it instantly reversed directions and flew off into the night sky ��� disappearing in the distance as it blinked out of sight. i saw it appear smaller and smaller in the short second or so before it disappeared.

one night roughly 4-5 weeks after my sighting, i was listening to the radio program coast to coast when a woman called in to report she had seen and object in the night sky at about the same time and date that i that i had experienced.

i don't usually listen to coast to coast because i have little time, but i do have quiet interest in the ufo phenomenon.


i have had other sightings before but this was the best of all. 
some other sightings included 4 or 5 disks travelling in a straight line formation silhouetted against a full moon as i looked at it through a telescope (i documented this sightings with sketches and notes- date: circa 1977 ), ���v��� formations in the night sky, a cylinder from a distance, a thick fluffy roughly spherical cloud that i video taped and that disappeared in the time that it took for me to switch my camera to photo-mode (about 3 seconds), and a cigar shaped craft when i was very young.
i certify that the above statements are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and i hope i have provided all the necessary information.

fs in california.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Stationary object appeared as a single jetliner landing light, approaching directly in my direction from typical landing path.

content.detailedDescription: I had went to challmet la. to help clean up after katrena.My job was to run a pump truck pumping  water as all the pump stations for the city was off line.I had been on the job for only 2 weeks or so.I had made a stop at one of my pump holes,(man holes).It was across the street from one of the many camper lots that were set up for the flooded out residence of the city.I got my truck set up pumping and it takes several minutes,(about 15) to load the truck.As soon as i got started i had a five gallon bucket i was using for a seat with not a lot to do but wait on my truck to load.I have always been a big time star gazer so i kinda enjoyed my chances to do just that while i waited for my truck to do its thing.Well anyway,as i was sitting there looking around somthing caught my eye coming in my direction from over the campers.At first i thought it was a plane or something but i reallized it was only about 100 feet high,(if that)and was going so slow that i could have ran and stayed under it if it had maintained the same speed and direction.I jumped up off my bucket and ran around to the other side of my truck trying to figure out what to heck it was.It kinda put me in mind of one of the stealth planes in the way it was shaped and it had maby 8 lights around the front.I have a hard time describing the color of the lights,they were all the same and i guess you could call them white but they were the coolest lights i have ever saw.The object moved straight above where i was standing in a state of awww and it turned to port with no apparent banking,it was like it was pretty much floating.The craft did have windows but i could not make out any thing of the inside nor did i see anybody.Once it made its turn it began to climb and gane speed at an incredable rate,from being straight above me to out of sight took maby 3 seconds.It was crasy!!!!Also the craft made no noise what so ever!!!!I know the government would want to tell me that i saw a swamp gas meteorite weather balloon radar deflector with dummies flying it but they can kiss my nevermind!!!!I know what i saw and nothing will ever change that.It is about time for the people that we put in to office to run this country on our behalf to stop thinking there better than the rest of the world!!!We the people are what gives them the resources to gain the information that they are keeping from us like we are all a bunch of kids or something.It is way past time for us to be given the truth about all the things going on.If you guys need any help in your research,please give me a chance.If i had access to the quality video equipment and enough funding to quit my day job i would dedicate my life to the research.Cameras pointing skyward from dusk till dawn seven nights a week and more!!!!The truth is out there and we all have the right to know what the government knows and with enough rock solid evidence they will have to come clean eventually.I have always beleaved in ufo's and that night in challmette changed my life forever.If you need someone else to help in this ongoing project,please keep me in mind.Well,good luck hunting and maby we will all know the real truth soon.I will contact you again if i get lucky enough to witness another swamp gas meteorite weather balloon radar deflector with dummies flying it.Thank you very much for your time.William wilson p.S.Watch the nasa channel when they send up the shuttle,they try to hide objects by changing camera shots but there are things zooming back and forth and up and down that aint no satalite or space junk.Once again thanks for listoning,bill
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I first saw the object at  almost a hover coming toward were i was running my pump truck at about 100 feet high and then it turned and was gone with in a few seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my friend down a darkened street.  i was looking at the stars north northeast.  suddenly a bright light appeared approximately 60 degrees above the horizon.  it was a white light.  very bright.  much brighter than venus and about an inch or possibly inch and a quarter wide when holding my hand at arms length and "piching" it between my fingers.  the light was moving north and possibly down.  after 4 seconds, the light diminished greatly.  it became nearly invisible to the human eye, but i was able to track it visually.  it continued on it's north/downward path for two minutes before i could no longer see it.  i thought it was a meteorite at first glance.  i see meteorites very regularly, and i am sure this was no meteorite.
content.summary: Large bright light.  diminishes in brightness and moving north.

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see this personally but it was witnessed simultaniously by my sister and her neighbor boy.... i should give you a little background... it seems like for years there has been some type of ufo experiences involving my sister ever since she was a young girl... she is in her mid 50's now.... when i was younger, about 8 or 9 years old, i moved into her room just after she moved out of the house... not long after that i was awoken by a whirring sound and lights in my window overlooking our back yard.... i thought it was kinda strange because it was like 3 or 4 in the morning... anyway i thought it was a street sweeper driving through our alley.... but when i got up to take a peek, i was shocked and terrified to see that whatever it was it was in our back yard, which was impossible because we had a full 6 foot high wooden fence around our yard. thats all i could take, i was so scared i jumped back in bed and got under the covers... thats all i remember.... 
anyway, that was just one event that i am aware of that seemed to be some connection between my sister and mysterious ufo phenomenon.... 
ok now to get on to this latest sighting.... my sister told me i guess it was about mid july, that one night they (her and her husband)were awakened by something strange happening outside their house... thats when they said they witnessed this ufo hovering above their house.... i can't remember a lot of the details as it was a few months ago she told me this story, but the strange thing about the story is that the next day they questioned what they had seen and thought maybe it was a dream, but then the next door neighbor kid came over and said, "jackie, jackie, i saw a ufo over your house last night, and then he drew a picture of it, and it was exactly the same thing they had seen.... 
anyway that is a rough reccolection of what she told me, but if you would like maybe i can have her talk to someone from your group.... i am not a real beleiver in this kind of stuff, or should i say more specifically i beleive there is something out there, but i am a christian of strong faith and am not too concerned one way or another about ufo phenomenon... but i beleive we are being visited for some reason, good or bad.... also it is possible that my sister has some kind of implant in her leg, because some years ago she mentioned something about that to me .... 
anyway, some of what i mentioned here may be a bit off but to the best of my knowledge it is roughly accurate.... thanks for your kind ear and god bless.... marty
content.summary: Ufo hovered over my sisters house

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of aug. 28th i went out to search and take pictures of the luna eclipse which was to begin at 0552 am on the east coast.I knew it would be difficult to find the moon so i left my house at 0525 am to get a head start.I could not loacte the moon at all and i thought this may be due to the surounding buildings and brightly lit area in which i live.I decided to walk to an area where my view wouldnt be obstructed.I found myself about a half a mile away from home and still no sight of the moon,although a bright star
( at least i thought it was)caught my attention.This star like object shined very brightly almost like a diamond then dimmed dramatically,it repeated this sequence 4 or 5 times as i managed to get off 5 photos.As i was taking shots of this object i said to myself,please come closer,dont go away.No sooner than i said this the object blinked out and never returned.What i felt next was a feeling that told me to go to the park.I knew the park was at least a little over a mile and a half away but i had to be there.I thought that going to this park with a wide open space would give me a better chance to observe the luna eclipse.It was now 0600 hrs and nothing.Im in the middle of a park at 6 in the morning,what the hell am i doing here?I believed my venture to be a lost cause so i began to take pictures of the sun rise which was just begining. i took 9 photos and started back home.When i arrived home i went through the photos and almost fell out by what i saw in 1 of the 9 pics.Was this my angel?The image was not in my viewfinder or in the sky when i shot the photo.My gut reaction was that this was the most beautiful thing i have ever seen.It also tunrned out to be one great big spiritual event for me.So if you can help me find out what it means not just for myself but for the world and confirm my angel maybe we would all be better off.
content.summary: An angel riding the sky

content.detailedDescription:
on tuesday, october 9, 2007 at around 11:05 pm, i was sitting on my back deck smoking a cigar.  i had recently started looking at constellations while i smoke my cigars at night.  i looked towards the sky and saw what i thought was a triangular pattern of 8-10 stars that i never noticed before directly to the east.  i am not very knowledgable about constellations and wasn't suprised to see stars that i've never noticed.
    then the starlike lights started moving south at a constant speed.  i had to stand up because i was amazed.  i watched the white lights until a street light was in between myself and them and i could no longer see them at about south south east of my location.  when i first noticed the lights until i could no longer see them was about 30-45 seconds.  they seemed to move a little slower than an airplane.
    the lights only appeared to be stationary momentarily when i first saw them.  they did not flash or change colors.  at the time, i figured it was a large v shaped object with lights in a row on each "wing" of the v, but it could have just been smaller objects with lights in a v pattern.  it appeared to be around 2 miles to my east.  it was approximately the size of a quarter at arms length.
   i went inside and wrote down what happened and a drew a picture of the object in a notebook.(attached)  it was 11:11 pm when i started writing.  i went back outside hoping to see more.  the next few nights i was ready with my camera, but i haven't seen anything else.
   -attachment- i dont have the best handwriting, and i was writing fast. -
content.summary: Triangular object or triangular formation of lights in the sky. omaha, ne, douglas county, benson area

content.detailedDescription:
Was building a metal buiding.  looked up and took off running to my house.
scared me silly.
content.summary: Saw an oval about 1/4 mile above, blue & red lights, scared me!

content.detailedDescription:
The following picture is on file with the fdny.
when i first saw the picture (taken on the anniversary of the 9-11 attack but don't know which year.
i thought it was a smudge. on further investigation (enlarging the area)
you can see what appears to be some kind of craft.
believe it or not this same craft was in the sky on 9-11-01.
i reported it then also.

this cigar shaped object is illuminated with lights. 
i was thinking of taking the photo to a good photography place to see what it is.

on my own computer i am able to enlarge it to see some of the details.

i am sure it is an object used for patrolling. my guess it is an unmanned
space craft. the one i saw on 9-11-01 looked like something from
the "jetsons". in that cartoon, the exhaust of their flying vehicles is portrayed as clear bubbles coming from the rear of the air craft.
on 9-11-01 the same "bubbles" could be seen.
it would only make sense to patrol the skies on ensuing 9-11 anniversaries.
i'm sure our gov't isn't telling us what it is.
i just hope it is being used for our protection.
i think we now possess in our technology a way to propel an aircraft
without jetfuel, and i think we have the capability to use it in
automobiles. although this craft may be nuclear. that is something our gov't doesn't want us to know.
one day the truth will come out.
content.summary: A cylindrical craft (illuminated) can be seen in this picture

content.detailedDescription:
Check out the website below at 1:52 to 1:53 sec.  you will see a disc shape ufo flies from right lower corner to left top corner. 

http://cosmos.Bcst.Yahoo.Com/ver/249.0/popup/index.Php?Cl=4905283
content.summary: Shuttle landing pictures and website link to the video

content.detailedDescription:
I was reading the good news that discovery returned safely to earth today. 
 
whilst watching the linked footage below i noticed something unusual. unusual in as much that, to my knowledge, there shouldn't be anything else up in the air in the vicinity of the shuttle when it lands. yet, at two distinct places in the footage, there do appear to be (technically) ufos. 
 
i found the best way to view them is to go to full screen mode. the first object appears at about 7 seconds from the right of the frame. it's in the frame for less than a second so you'll have to use the 'pause' button a lot. the second object appears from the lower left part of the screen at about 11 seconds and isn't there for very long either. 
 
i'm assuming they're not helicopters (dangerous and i thought used more for the older sea landings?), other planes (banned as far as i know), birds (too big), or balloons (danger and why??), aerial attachments to poles / pylons (no poles / pylons) visible.  
 
maybe there is a perfectly logical explanation (although i class ufos as buzzing shuttles logical, however... ;) ) ? have you any ideas what the objects are or might be?  
 
i thought i'd send the footage to you before the objects get airbrushed out ;) a point worth noting is that ufo (visual) encounters with the shuttles and their crew whilst in orbit are, apparently, regular and, again, 'according to sources', considered 'normal' by those charged with monitoring the shuttle from earth.

this is the direct link:
 
http://news.Bbc.Co.Uk/player/nol/newsid_7080000/newsid_7083600/7083663.Stm?Bw=bb&mp=wm&asb=1&news=1&ms3=22
 
if that doesn't work go to the main bbc news page and look for the vid link http://news.Bbc.Co.Uk/
 
if none of those work then the airbrushers have got to it first ;)
content.summary: Two ufos appear to be in the vicinity of shuttle discovery on landing approach

content.detailedDescription: I was unloading corn in the grain bin, i looked up to check the sight glass at the top of the bin.  thats when i noticed this object in the sky at first i thought it might have been a helicopter it was high off in the distance.  but all of a sudden it was over us at a lower level thats when i realized it wasn't a plane or bird, it was a differnt object without sound.   i yelled to my wife and mother look up what is this thing? it appeared to be a dark in color, flat and disc shape.  we watched it travel over us it appeared at times to have traveled in different positions.  (from flat to on edge). it had no sound or any noticable lighting.  it was around 5:30 pm on tuesday october 30th 2007.  the weather was clear.  it route of travel seemed to be from south to north. it all of a sudden rapidly took off in the northern direction. total observation experience was approx. 2 minutes.
content.summary: It was dark in color  moved rapiley disk shape it would go from flying flat to up on edge

content.detailedDescription:
Floor 17 of the bellagio in las vegas, nv.  i just arrived in my hotel room and decided to take pictures of the lights outside of the hotel room window.  i did not see anything unusual when i took the pictures but when i got home and downloaded them on my computer, an unusual object appeared. 

i have other pictures outside of the window of the hotel room and none of them have this object in it.

the object is in the right hand side of the picture, 1/3 from the top, brass in color.  i have also included a cropped, zoomed, copy of the picture.
content.summary: Taking pictures through window of hotel room

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the morning news (6:30) when my wife called me to the back steps. she said, "look at that." it looked like a planet and then i noticed the one following it. there were two lights flying at low altitude one in front of the other from the southwest in a steady pattern to the northeast. the front light was bigger than the one trailing behind it. the last light was smaller. there was no noise and the lights did not flash or have any color. i had never seen anything like it before. my wife and i really didn't discuss it until tonight and even though we are sure that someone can explain it (or try) it was very weird. the objects disappeared.
i read on this site that someone in arkansas had a very similar sighting this morning and decided to report what we saw.
content.summary: Two lights flying one behind the other southwest to northeast nonflashing bright big lights

content.detailedDescription:
I video taped a semi-cloaked ufo a couple of weeks ago and many others. i'm sending you a link to the high res version. passing by the star arcturus is definitely one of our friends. this was filmed two weeks ago october 2007 at my house which is two hundred yards from newport's old stone mill. it works best to right click the movie for full screen in a completely dark room with a good monitor as it seems to be semi-cloaked. some people say they can't see it but i sure can. turn up your sound, you can hear a woosh as it glides by also notice the green flash interacting with my infrared camera as the ufo enters at bottom right. i seem to be in close contact for about seven years i've had many sightings and finally their showing up on film. some of my family members where the ultimate skeptics until they saw this one. don't miss larry kings ufo show coming up this thursday at 9:00 pm. also listen to the ronald_reagan_ufo_briefing.Htm at my site webcamufo.Com you can contact me at  ufos@youfo.Us  with comments or questions.        -dc

                                   )-(
content.summary: Another semi-cloaked boomerang with audio flying by arcturus

content.detailedDescription: I was 15 years ol or so at the time. it was a cool october night and i was in my parents house watching t.V. all of a sudden my sister and her sister -in-law pulled in the driveway and ran inside the house frantic telling me there was a ufo down the road in the sky. i wasnt sure to believe them butall three of us got into the truck and drove down the raod about a half mile where they saw it.  as we drove i saw nothing in the sky. as my sister turned the truck around to go back home the sky light up over the left side of the truck we pulled the truck over and saw a huge ufo, with huge lights on the side and a glowing bottom that had vented rigges on it. it flew very low to the point to where you could see it very well. it was flying over the tops of the trees and flew across a feild at a very slow pace till it went over the tree lines never to be seen by us again. it was the most amazing thing we had ever seen!! it moved without sound and seemed to be just on route. i know 100% that it wasnt anything other than a ufo.It was to close and to bright not to know this.Ever since that day i have looked to the skies in hope to seeit again. i never feel the need to debate the existance of ufo,s because my sister and her sister-in-law and i saw one that day in october!
content.summary: Big. roundish ,big lights on the side quiet and flew very low.

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime between 6:15 and 6:30 am on 11/06/07, i witnessed two lights in the sky.  looking west from my backyard, i saw two lights moving generally from southwest to northeast (though actual movement may have been anywhere between that and true south to north).  there was a relatively larger solid white light apparently being pursued by a smaller white light.  speed was difficult to determine, but appeared to be close to that of commercial airliners.  as i watched, the smaller object drew nearer to the larger object, but never caught up by the time that they became obscured by the trees to my north.

i saw no lights flashing on either object, which is what caused me to continue to watch them, since i usually see the lights of commercial airplanes flashing.  there were no major changes in speed of either object, although the smaller of the two failed to catch the larger, so i suspect one slowed down or sped up.

in answer to the points to include:

1)  i had just returned from filling up the family car with gas and was returning into my house from the back patio.

2)  i noticed the objects because there were two of them moving in the same direction, which is unusual.  the fact that there were no flashing lights as seen on most planes also seemed unusual.  finally, the fact that they were of different sizes suggested it was not two military jets on the way to either of the bases to the east of me.

3)  i first assumed the objects were planes, but as i looked closely, i could not discern an airplane shape.  i just now (5:15 pm same day) watched a commercial jet fly overhead at cruising altitude and i could make out the wings.  i couldn't see any wings on the larger one for certain.  at this point, i would be unable to swear that the smaller one did not have wings, but i don't recall thinking that at the time.  although, based on size and movement, it left the encounter thinking that i had witnessed a small military jet chasing a larger ufo.

4)  object was bright white, oval, and far away.  flew in a straight line.  smaller one drew nearer to it from behind, but did not catch it.

5)  i was surprised by what i was seeing, because it was so unusual.  we live near an airport and have military bases to our east; i'm used to planes.  i haven't seen planes look or behave that way before.  there were no unusual flying maneuvers, but the fact that they were going the same way and apparently so close was striking.  i tried to dismiss it as planes, but i'm not convinced that they were, though one or both may have been.  the sun was coming up at the time, so i'm unsure whether the steady white light of them may have been a reflection from it and may have been bright enough to cover flashing lights, so i'm still not sure what i saw.

6)  flew behind trees to my north.
content.summary: Ufo chased by another flying object

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughter and wife had been viewing the night skies the past several nights from our upstair's balchony. after viewing the stars awhile i noticed at what i first thought was a star changing colors. the colors changed from red to white and to a blue at different times. the object would fly on a horizontal path slowly then position itself a good distance from it's origin position irratically and quickly. i have seen this object in the sky for over three nights in a row now. i noticed not to far from this object another object that i can best describe as a figure that contained what looked to be six ufos in the area that fly back and forth very quickly and were changing colors. what made the whole experience even more freaky was the fact that the whole figure that contained the ufos was moving slowly in the night sky towards the west of my house. this was a first in seeing anything similiar to this type of object. i have seen plenty of individual objects in our are that are simply ufos; not man made craft that fly and move at great rates of speed.
content.summary: Strange unidentified objects moving irractically in eastern sky.
